pip:argument.pip:name: xx
pip:argument.pip:description: Indicates whether the specified output file should be overwritten if it exists.

pip:argument.pip:name: a
pip:argument.pip:description: Indicates that XDC should try to use the absolute path of specified resources for copy operations

pip:argument.pip:name: s
pip:argument.pip:description: Indicates the session ID to be used for transactions.

pip:argument.pip:name: pp
pip:argument.pip:description: Indicates a substitution for the path prefix.

pip:argument.pip:name: ls
pip:argument.pip:description: Directs the client to render results as a list of files to the application output.

pip:argument.pip:name: auu
pip:argument.pip:description: Indicates whether unsmooth URIs (e.g. with contiguous forward slashes in the URI path) should be allowed. By default, XDC smooths URI paths.
